title: Properties Managment Website
description: A client-server website for managing properties management companies.  including data base management.

title: Join Tool
description: This tool is designed for merging and plotting data from multiple .txt files. The user can upload files, select columns to include, merge them based on a common column, and visualize the data through plots.

title: Neshama App
description: A website that allows the user to enter the name of the deceased and receive the entire study content for the "elui neshama".
